item.title: Enterprises can now run real-time data through Google Cloud’s most advanced VMs
item.description: Early adopters like Couchbase are already seeing significant price-performance gains with Google Cloud's new VMs.

item.title: You can now fine-tune your own version of AI image maker Flux with just 5 images
item.description: Whether for brand-consistent marketing visuals or detailed character art, the Flux Pro Finetuning API enhances precision and adaptability.

item.title: Google’s new neural-net LLM architecture separates memory components to control exploding costs of capacity and compute
item.description: Titans architecture complements attention layers with neural memory modules that select bits of information worth saving in the long term.

item.title: 4 bold AI predictions for 2025
item.description: Enterprises can prepare for AI becoming faster, cheaper and more capable in 2025, and take the lead on developing applications.

item.title: Build or buy? Scaling your enterprise gen AI pipeline in 2025
item.description: Successfully scaling gen AI requires clear, high-value use cases, technological flexibility and an adaptive workforce.
